content.prompt: The interior view of the chapel provides evidence that Brunelleschi emphasized the geometric order of the design by

choices.label: raising the floor of the side chapel above that of the central space
flooding the interior with light from windows in the dome
including low-relief sculpture in the circular roundels
outlining component forms with gray stone

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
